skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: I love listening to music. My favorite song is made by Lexington!
skins.secIdle2Text: Eep! S-Sorry, Commander! Typhoons and thunder are just too scary for me...
skins.secIdle3Text: The caring Yorktown, the cool Enterprise, the peppy Saratoga... The Eagle Union has good people left and right.
skins.secTouchText: My hair is a little messy? Oh, thank you for pointing it out! Please let me return the favor by giving you a massage later!
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Hm...? My chest doesn't hurt, so why'd you do that?

skins.name: A Christmas Thank-You
skins.secIdle1Text: The star at the top of the Christmas tree... I wonder what it could mean?
skins.secIdle2Text: Commander, don't forget to greet everyone on Christmas. Everyone's looking forward to seeing you.
skins.secIdle3Text: Gridley took lots of pictures of Lexington for me. I ought to thank her later.
skins.secTouchText: E-Ever since I put on this costume, Benson has been really staring me down...
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Pl-Please don't play around with the bells!
